DOC.brief_summary: To study the quality of life of patients with prostate cancer at a distance from their care at a time when they are supposed to have taken a "normal" life and compared to subjects without cancer prostate of the same age.
DOC.brief_title: Impact on Quality of Life 3 Years After Diagnosis of Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: exposed group prostate cancer diagnosed from 1 December 2011 to 31 December 2014 under 75 and residing in the Hérault department at diagnosis recruited in the EPICAP study Exclusion criteria: having relapsed in the range nonexposed group: controls (without prostate cancer) recruited in the EPICAP study matched to cases on age (5 years) residing in the Hérault department Exclusion criteria: diagnosis of prostate cancer set in the range
